title: misconfigured smb mountpoint ends in fatal error and blank page
body:
given, you want to add an smb mount. you fill in all the data, but say something like the "root" setting is wrong. you may don't know or don't notice it. either because it happens (or typos, too), or because the label is not so clear. then you go click on "files" and see a blank page.
